title: Ticket #3680: condor_submit reports wrong line number when line contuation is used
description:
From the rust ticket

When I submit the following submit file, condor_submit reports a strange line number (Line 13), but the error is actually on line 22 (missing ,\ at the end of the line). 

>condor_submit Analysys_Batch-submit.sub
Submitting job(s)
ERROR: Failed to parse command file (line 13).

01      #Arquivo de submissao ao HTCondor
02      universe              =  vanilla
03      Executable            =  RunExcelInBatchMode.bat
04      Log                   =  Sets.log
05      output                =  Sets.stdout
06      error                 =  Sets.stderr
07
08      when_to_transfer_output ON_EXIT
09
10      Requirements = ( Arch == "INTEL"    || \

12                     (OpSys == "WINNT51"  || \

15                      OpSys == "WINDOWS") && \
16                      Has_EXCEL
17

19                                Analysis_Batch.xls, \
20                                Inputs-Run-In-BatchMode.txt, \
21                                GRID_sets.htm, \
